sentences.sContent: Without settling this issue, Japan regards any form of rapprochement with North Korea as impossible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without settling this issue, Japan regards any form of rapprochement with North Korea as impossible.
sentences.sCn: 在日本看来，不解决这个问题，就不可能与朝鲜恢复任何形式的友好关系。

synos.tran: 友好；恢复邦交；友善关系的建立

remMethod.val: r (看作re， 重新) + approche (看作approach， 接近) + ment → 重新接近， 以示友好 → 和解

words.tran: 密切关系，交往；和谐一致

trans.tranCn: 友好；恢复邦交；友善关系的建立
trans.tranOther: the establishment of a good relationship between two countries or groups of people, after a period of unfriendly relations
